title: pixel launcher crashes after december update
content:
After the most recent update (Dec 2019) my pixel immediately started showing the notification: Pixel launcher keeps stopping.

I have waited till the update finished (also the optimization part)
rebooted the phone multiple times
deleted the cache
started in safemode

nothing helps.

Cant go to playstore to remove the update, as I cant get to the home screen and go to an app
